verses.verse: Bear and Share the Burdens Brethren, if a man is overtaken in any trespass, you who are spiritual restore such a one in a spirit of (Eph. 4:2) gentleness, considering yourself lest you also be tempted.
(Acts 20:35; Rom. 15:1; 1 Thess. 5:14) Bear one anotherâ€™s burdens, and so fulfill ((James 2:8)) the law of Christ.
For (Rom. 12:3) if anyone thinks himself to be something, when ((2 Cor. 3:5; James 1:22)) he is nothing, he deceives himself.
But (1 Cor. 11:28) let each one examine his own work, and then he will have rejoicing in himself alone, and (Luke 18:11) not in another.
For ((Rom. 2:6)) each one shall bear his own load.
Be Generous and Do Good (1 Cor. 9:11, 14) Let him who is taught the word share in all good things with him who teaches.
Do not be deceived, God is not mocked; for ((Rom. 2:6)) whatever a man sows, that he will also reap.
For he who sows to his flesh will of the flesh reap corruption, but he who sows to the Spirit will of the Spirit reap ((Rom. 6:8)) everlasting life.
And (1 Cor. 15:58; 2 Cor. 4:1; 2 Thess. 3:13) let us not grow weary while doing good, for in due season we shall reap ((Matt. 24:13); Heb. 12:3, 5; (James 5:7, 8)) if we do not lose heart.
(Prov. 3:27; (John 9:4; 12:35)) Therefore, as we have opportunity, (Titus 3:8) let us do good to all, (Rom. 12:13) especially to those who are of the household of faith.
Glory Only in the Cross See with what large letters I have written to you with my own hand!
As many as desire to make a good showing in the flesh, these would compel you to be circumcised, (Gal. 5:11; Phil. 3:8) only that they may not suffer persecution for the cross of Christ.
For not even those who are circumcised keep the law, but they desire to have you circumcised that they may boast in your flesh.
But God forbid that I should boast except in the ((1 Cor. 1:18)) cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom the world has been crucified to me, and ((Gal. 2:20); Col. 2:20) I to the world.
For ((Rom. 2:26, 28); 1 Cor. 7:19; (Gal. 5:6)) in Christ Jesus neither circumcision nor uncircumcision avails anything, but a new creation.
Blessing and a Plea And as many as walk according to this rule, peace and mercy be upon them, and upon the Israel of God.
From now on let no one trouble me, for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus.
Brethren, the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Amen.
